location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to Lieutenant Colonel Edward Hutchins Bellasis, Commissary General, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter informing Lieutenant-Colonel Bellasis that his letter had been delivered to Dr Black of HC Cruizer Elphinstone, but that as the medecines were received by Dr Black during Colonel Stannus's absence he had not yet received the receipts required.
